ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
ack.p: The authors thank Dr Licheng Liu for the assistance and advice with the software. We thank staff members from Center for Disease Control and Prevention in 12 districts of Guangzhou, China, and all individuals who contributed to this research.

This work was supported by the Project for Key Medicine Discipline Construction of Guangzhou Municipality (grant no. 2013-2015-07); National Natural Science Foundation of China (NSFC) (no. 81273139); Guangdong Natural Science Foundation (no. S2013010013637, no. 2015A030313784), the Collaborative Innovation Project of Bureau of Science and Technology of Guangzhou Municipality (no. 201508020263); and the Bureau of Health of Guangzhou Municipality (no. 2014A011090004). The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
